item.title: Jeffrey Katzenberg’s Next Investment: Drone-Powered Light Shows
item.description: Elon Musk’s younger brother, Kimbal, is developing night sky-based light shows driven by music, motion and unmanned aerial technology and enlisted Katzenberg as an advisor.
